thread.title: Nyantakyi salutes FIFA's ethics committee for being stern on corruption
thread.title_full: Nyantakyi salutes FIFA's ethics committee for being stern on corruption

title: Nyantakyi salutes FIFA's ethics committee for being stern on corruption
text:
21:55 CET Nyantakyi salutes FIFA's ethics committee for being stern on corruption - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
President of the Ghana Football Association, Kwesi Nyantakyi, an avowed supporter of indicted Fifa President, Sepp Blatter, has hailed the organisation for provisionally suspending him. Mr. 
Nyantakyi says FIFA deserves commendation for provisionally suspending Sepp Blatter, Fifa General Secretary Jerome Valcke and UEFA President Michel Platini over allegations of impropriety. Members of Fifa's ethics committee met this week after the Swiss attorney general opened criminal proceedings against Blatter, 79, last month. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
